oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All Star Western Theatre - 1948-04-03 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of All Star Western Theatre radio program from April 3, 1948. Featuring Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage, with announcer Terry O'Sullivan, and guest Nick Lucas.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Foy Willing; Riders Of The Purple Sage
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Drifting Along, Singing A Song) -- Opening statement (Terry O'Sullivan) -- Ridin' Ropin' (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Foy Willing talks -- Sometime (Foy Willing and the Riders Of The Purple Sage) -- Weber's Bread commercial -- Foy Willing introduces Nick Lucas -- I'm Looking Over A Four Leaf Clover / Among My Souvenirs / Bye Bye Blackbird (medley) (Nick Lucas) -- Foy Willing thanks Nick Lucas -- Terry O'Sullivan introduces the radio play -- Radio play 'The Year Of The Terrible Blizzard' [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mutual Broadcasting System; KHJ-TV (Radio station : Los Angeles, Calif.); All star western theatre (Radio program); O'Sullivan, Terry, 1915-2006; Willing, Foy, 1914-1978; Riders of the Purple Sage; Sloey, Al; Paul, Johnny (Violinist); Harrell, Scotty; Farnworth, Scott; Lansing, Mary; Lucas, Nick
